message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $18000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I'm interested, $18000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12000, which is my absolute maximum. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've invested a lot in this product and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $15000. Can you consider that?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $15000 is still outside my budget.  I'm happy to come up to $13000, but that's truly my limit.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $14000, but that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me there?
Alice, I'm really trying to work this out.  $14000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to meet you at $13500. This is really my final offer - I can't go any higher.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm willing to meet you at $14000, but I need to make a profit, so I'm not going to go any lower than that. Can you reconsider?
